item.title: Framework for capital allocation
item.description: Framework for capital allocation In this resource starved world, capital is scarce. Every dollar that you owned has its place and deserved to be allocated properly. Currently, I already have a huge chunk of capital tied up in a diversified portfolio levered up to 1.4 times. Portfolio is expected to outperform/ match up to market returns with 2 to 3 times lower risk - in terms of standard deviation and drawdown.

item.title: Integrating volatility targeting into Jarvis, my expert advisor
item.description: Volatility targeting Currently, I’ve a suite of toolkits integrated into my Jarvis that advises me on the investing decisions that I’ve to make on a daily basis. On the latest feature I cobbled together on a Saturday evening, 2 weeks ago, I’ve decided to measure the volatility of my portfolio formally. Why I’m doing this is because managing risks in the form of volatility is easier than targeting returns.
